name: Space Invaders (itch) (Azra)
description:
This is my first game, recreating Space Invaders for Swagshaw's Game Jam "Make a game club".
(the theme was, wait for it, space invaders!)

This is just a loop of the same level at the moment.
Move the canon using the left and right arrow. ← →
Shoot using the top arrow. ↑
Pause the game using the space bar, or the hamburger menu on the top right corner.
(Don't forget to click in the game window  or the controls won't work)

Thanks for playing, have fun !

Sprites (a bit modified) by comp3interactive
Music by Mini Roc
